import * as React from "react" import * as App from "./App" import * as Svg from "../Svg" class RoomCard extends React.Component{ render() { return (
{this.data.hotel} {this.data.price}
{this.data.room}
{this.data.description}
{this.data.bed_svg ? Svg.bed(this.state.isLiked) : null} {this.data.bath_svg ? Svg.bath(this.state.isLiked) : null} {this.data.couch_svg ? Svg.couch(this.state.isLiked) : null} {this.data.tv_svg ? Svg.tv(this.state.isLiked) : null} {this.data.wine_svg ? Svg.wine(this.state.isLiked) : null}
{Svg.star(!this.state.isLiked)}
) } } export default RoomCard
